Submodules¶

admin.services module¶

admin.services.clean_up_files(snap_id, group_id)[source]¶

Deletes all picture files for a given snap if those pictures sources are designated in the group to be deleted after processing

admin.services.create_default_settings_and_group_documents()[source]¶

Creates a settings object and group object with their default settings. Saves both objects.

admin.services.default_group_dict()[source]¶

Wrapper method returning a dict with the default group settings.

admin.services.default_settings_dict(group_id)[source]¶

Wrapper method returning a dict with the default values settings. Takes the group id, the only useful data to speak of in this object.

admin.services.find_groups(args_dict, **kwargs)[source]¶

Retrieves a dict of all groups. Key is the group id, value is the dict for the group.

admin.services.get_group_document(group_id)[source]¶

Fetches the group document specified by the requested id

admin.services.get_group_document_with_child_links(group_id)[source]¶

Fetches a group document, adds a picture_links array to it which has links to all the photos for that group

admin.services.get_group_document_with_child_objects(group_id)[source]¶

Fetches the group document specified by the requested id Also provides links to child photo objects in a child array called snap_list

admin.services.get_picture_links_for_group(group_id)[source]¶

Gets all the pictures belonging to a given group id

admin.services.get_picture_objects_for_group(group_id)[source]¶

Gets all the pictures belonging to a group, groups them in an array under the snaps they belong to

admin.services.get_settings_document()[source]¶

Fetches the settings document (a singleton)

admin.services.save_document(document_in)[source]¶

Saves any document Gets doc id from the _id field Has safeguards to avoid changing document type Has safeguards to avoid saving derived properties

admin.services.send_mail(snap_id, group_id)[source]¶

Sends an email to users specified in the group, with all the images for a supplied snap

admin.services.upload_files_to_s3(snap_id, group_id)[source]¶

Uploads pictures for a given snap to s3 Takes a snap id and group id, if the group is configured to use a gallery it looks for all pictures whose

values for source matches those are specified in the group to use for the gallery

admin.tasks module¶

admin.views module¶

admin.views.doc_attribute_can_be_set(key_name)[source]¶
admin.views.get_group(group_id)[source]¶

Gets a particular group supports these levels of information:

  • group dict only
  • links to photos
  • photos included, grouped by snap id
admin.views.get_group_gallery(group_id)[source]¶

Fetches the photo gallery for a supplied group id

admin.views.get_group_pictures(group_id)[source]¶

Fetches pictures for a supplied group id

admin.views.get_paging_info_from_request(request)[source]¶
admin.views.get_settings()[source]¶

Returns the settings document (it’s a singleton)

admin.views.index()[source]¶
  • one thing
  • another thing

Returns a top level index of the admin views :param name: The name to use. :type name: str. :param state: Current state to be in. :type state: bool. :returns: int – the return code. :raises: AttributeError, KeyError

admin.views.list_groups()[source]¶

Lists all groups

admin.views.save_group()[source]¶

Creates a new group record, saves it as the new current group in the settings document

admin.views.update_group(group_id)[source]¶

Updates group record

admin.views.update_settings()[source]¶

Updates the settings document
